entries.title: Woman dies after crowd crush at London concert venue
entries.description: One woman has died from her injuries after a crowd crush at O2 Brixton Academy, which left several critically injured. Police were called to the scene after people tried to enter the venue without tickets for a sold-out show for Nigerian singer Asake, causing the deadly crush.

entries.title: Woman dies after crowd crush at London concert venue
entries.description: One woman has died from her injuries after a crowd crush at O2 Brixton Academy, which left several critically injured. Police were called to the scene after people tried to enter the venue without tickets for a sold-out show for Nigerian singer Asake, causing the deadly crush.

entries.title: Iran authorities arrest Taraneh Alidoosti, actress of Oscar-winning movie  'The Salesman'
entries.description: Iranian authorities arrested one of the country’s most famous actresses on charges of spreading falsehoods about nationwide protests that grip the country.

entries.title: Are Elon Musk and Twitter heading for a clash with Europe's 'red lines?'
entries.description: Elon Musk’s suspension of several high-profile journalists from Twitter drew backlash from the European Union, warning he could fall foul of tough new rules.

entries.title: Missing college student reunited with family and heading back to U.S., French officials say
entries.description: American student Ken Deland Jr., reported missing during a study abroad trip in France, was reunited with his mother and heading to the U.S., officials said.

entries.title: Beijing locks itself down as a wave of cases and uncertainty follows ‘zero Covid’ retreat
entries.description: Beijing is facing a wave of Covid infections

entries.title: U.K. royal aide says sorry to charity boss over race comment
entries.description: Royal aide Lady Susan Hussey, who resigned after asking Sistah Space's Ngozi Fulani where she was “really” from at a palace event, apologized in person Friday.

entries.title: Jordan bans TikTok after police officer killed in protests
entries.description: Jordan on Friday announced a “temporary ban” on TikTok, a day after a police officer was killed during clashes with protesters over high fuel prices.

entries.title: International monkey trade exploded due to Covid vaccine development
entries.description: The multibillion-dollar international monkey trade exploded because it supplied researchers with laboratory animals as they raced to develop Covid vaccines. In an NBC News investigation, Stephanie Gosk has more details on ethical concerns about the trade and how the Department of Justice filed charges against a monkey supplier.

entries.title: Russia targeting Ukrainian power grid during frigid winter
entries.description: Russia fired at least 76 missiles, most of them at Kyiv, according to Ukraine, and were targeting energy infrastructure. NBC News’ Ellison Barber has the latest details on the ongoing conflict.
